results.title: Spastic children's sports meeting
results.brief_description: Shows a group of young handicapped children competing in various races and rolling and ball activities, supervised and watched by adults. Location near the ocean (maybe Mornington Peninsula?).

results.title: Sparky the colt
results.brief_description: Part of the series “Background for reading and expression”. The film tells the story of the first weeks in the life of a colt, showing how he becomes acquainted with the farm and makes friends with his young master.

results.title: Spanish and Portugese explorations
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Age of Discovery”.
Scenes of Spanish and Portugese towns and photographs of statues, paintings, and other material of historical interest are used to provide a background to the exploration of new routes to the Orient and to the New World. Reference is made to the voyages of Prince Henry the Navigator, Columbus, Vasco Da Gama, Magellan, the Conquistadores, and others.

results.title: Spain: a journey with Washington Irving
results.brief_description: This film retraces the path of Irving’s original journey through Spain today. Includes visits to the bullring at Pamplona; the art treasures of the Prado in Madrid; La Mancha, the legendary home of Don Quixote and finally the city of Barcelona.

results.title: Spain and Portugal on the threshold of success
results.brief_description: Shows the geographic features, natural resources, and strategic location of Spain and Portugal; investigates their struggle to become modern industrial nations. Explains variations in types of agriculture because of differences in rainfall. Describes such industrial centres as Lisbon, Oporto, Madrid and Barcelona. Discusses the problems of the farmers of the Meseta region. Shows scenes of Jerez de Frontera, Bilboa, Valencia and Seville.

results.title: Spaceship Skylab: wings of discovery
results.creator_credit: AV Corporation and United States. National Aeronautics Space Administration
results.brief_description: A documentary film on the Skylab Spacestation comprising a montage of still and live footage emphasising its scientific attributes. A giant solar telescope, Earth resources experiments, a materials processing furnace, medical experiment facilities, pollution research and observation and geological analysis all make Skylab an instrument of experiment and discovery.

results.title: Spaced out sports
results.brief_description: A short, comic look at human behaviour through the eyes of an alien race observing team sports - late in the 20th century, a time capsule was launched into space. The Cryptics who found the capsule 500 years later made some arcane observations from their findings. Team mascots become pagan gods; cheerleaders become vestal virgins; and the violence, competitive nature and antics of the players and crowds make for a convincing inference that the human race had destroyed themselves.
